meta.description: Listen now (39 min) | The stunning conclusion of an 'undercover' mission to find out how the vaccine industry answers tough questions about COVID vaccines.

title: Part 2: What The Vaccine Industry Says Behind Closed Doors About Vaccines
cleaned_text:
Set Your Pulse: Take a breath. Release the tension in your body. Place attention on your physical heart. Breathe slowly into the area for 60 seconds, focusing on feeling a sense of ease. Click here to learn why we suggest this.

As you may recall from Part 1, our good friend Dr. Madhava Setty recently attended the World Vaccine Congress in Washington, DC. It featured some major voices from the FDA, Big Pharma, DARPA, Universities, and government institutions.

Madhava had a chance to ask these experts pertinent questions about COVID vaccines, and the answers he got back were rather revealing.

Below is our LATEST conversation as we debrief his final day at the event. (Part 1 is below as well.)
